title: Brooch And Pair Of Earrings, ca. 1860
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Gustav E. Kissel
dimensions:
H x W x D (brooch -a): 5.8 x 4.8 x 1.3 cm (2 5/16 x 1 7/8 x 1/2 in.)
H x W x D (earring -b): 6.4 x 1.9 x 1.1 cm (2 1/2 x 3/4 x 7/16 in.)
H x W x D (earring -c): 6.5 x 1 x 1.9 cm (2 9/16 x 3/8 x 3/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Gustav E. Kissel
description: Brooch (a) and earrings (b,c) of aluminum set in elaborate gold mounts and covered with fine bright-cut engraving; brooch with six semi-circular segments surmounting circular form decorated with chevrons, above a linked chain and a small, circular, foliate motif pendant; pendant earrings, each with one horizontal and two vertical semi-circular segments surmounting small, circular, foliate motif pendant.

exhibitions.title: Faster, Cheaper, Newer, More: The Revolutions of 1848

tombstone.epitaph:
Brooch And Pair Of Earrings, ca. 1860.
ca. 1860. Aluminum, gold. Gift of Mrs. Gustav E. Kissel. 1928-5-4-a/c.
